title: Conv2d Cannot be Initialized with a Bias Tensor with Multiple Elements
body_html:
When you do initialize a Conv2d with:

layer = torch.nn.Conv2d(2, 3, 4, 1, 1, bias=torch.tensor([1, 4]))

You may face this error message. Can you check this issue?

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "pruner.py", line 236, in <module>
    model = prune_conv_layer(model, 28, 10)
  File "pruner.py", line 135, in prune_conv_layer
    bias = torch.Tensor([1, 5]))#conv.bias)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.7/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/conv.py", line 297, in __init__
    False, _pair(0), groups, bias)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.7/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/conv.py", line 34, in __init__
    if bias:
RuntimeError: bool value of Tensor with more than one value is ambiguous
body_text:
When you do initialize a Conv2d with:
layer = torch.nn.Conv2d(2, 3, 4, 1, 1, bias=torch.tensor([1, 4]))

You may face this error message. Can you check this issue?
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "pruner.py", line 236, in <module>
    model = prune_conv_layer(model, 28, 10)
  File "pruner.py", line 135, in prune_conv_layer
    bias = torch.Tensor([1, 5]))#conv.bias)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.7/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/conv.py", line 297, in __init__
    False, _pair(0), groups, bias)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.7/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/conv.py", line 34, in __init__
    if bias:
RuntimeError: bool value of Tensor with more than one value is ambiguous
body:
When you do initialize a Conv2d with:

```
layer = torch.nn.Conv2d(2, 3, 4, 1, 1, bias=torch.tensor([1, 4]))
```

You may face this error message. Can you check this issue?

```
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "pruner.py", line 236, in <module>
    model = prune_conv_layer(model, 28, 10)
  File "pruner.py", line 135, in prune_conv_layer
    bias = torch.Tensor([1, 5]))#conv.bias)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.7/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/conv.py", line 297, in __init__
    False, _pair(0), groups, bias)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.7/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/conv.py", line 34, in __init__
    if bias:
RuntimeError: bool value of Tensor with more than one value is ambiguous
```
